ABOUT LIAM
• Member of Parliament for Birmingham Hodge Hill & Solihull North (Labour)
• Member of His Majesty's Privy Council
• Chair of the House of Commons Business & Trade Select Committee
• Member of the House of Commons Joint Committee on National Security and the Liaison Committee
• Chair of the Global Parliamentary Network on the World Bank and IMF
• Honorary Professor, University of Birmingham and Visiting Parliamentary Fellow, St Anthony's College, Oxford
• Proud Patron, National Association of Children of Alcoholics
• Former Cabinet Minister, serving in the Home Office, Number 10 Downing Street, and Her Majesty's Treasury
• Author of over 20 books, articles and chapters on political economy, economic history, foreign affairs and public service reform
• Former Fulbright Scholar, Harvard Business School (MBA with Honours) and Gwilym Gibbon Research Fellow, Nuffield College, Oxford
